name: Rackham's Shambala Adventure
description:
Experience exciting adventures with Joe Rackham, who has settled in China.
Discover Shambala / Shangri-La and exciting puzzles on your way there.
In the demo the beginning of the story is playable.

How you pay "Hong" your employee, influences the difficulty. The first task will be to wake Uncle Frankie, who sleeps peacefully on the couch in Joe's house.

- Point and Click Adventure Game
- In German (Switzerland)
- Funny dialogues, exciting puzzles
- Various locations (China, Africa, Tibet)
- Sound and atmosphere
- Text-based without speech output, in classic adventure style
